meanings.definition: A person who is addicted to drugs.
meanings.sent1: The junkies gathered in the alley to get their fix.
meanings.sent2: The city has programs to help junkies overcome their addiction.
meanings.sent3: The junkies at the rehab center joked about their cravings.
meanings.sent4: The streets were filled with junkies chasing their next high.
meanings.sent5: The image of the junkies shooting up stayed with him for days.

meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with or has a strong interest in a particular activity or thing.
meanings.sent1: Movie junkies eagerly awaited the release of the new blockbuster.
meanings.sent2: Book junkies often spend hours lost in different worlds.
meanings.sent3: The fashion junkies in the office always had the latest trends.
meanings.sent4: Music junkies could talk for hours about their favorite bands.
meanings.sent5: The tech junkies were the first to try out the latest gadgets.
